Literature.Title: The design and evaluation of the antimicrobial activity of a novel conjugated penta-ultrashort antimicrobial peptide in combination with conventional antibiotics against sensitive and resistant strains of S. aureus and E. coli.
Literature.Author: Darwish R, Almaaytah A, Salama A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29215(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29215(MBC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-41(MBC=15µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=18µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=18µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-3054(MIC=25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-3054(MBC=25µM)
